title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 923.4 - Table I

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 923.4 - Table I
State Regulations
TABLE I
CLASSIFICATIONS AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
ASSIGNED TO FRESH SURFACE WATERS AND TIDAL SALT WATERS OF SHINNECOCK BAY -
MECOX BAY DRAINAGE BASIN, SUFFOLK COUNTY, NEW YORK, WHICH INCLUDES A PORTION OF
THE ATLANTIC OCEAN
Item No. Waters Index

Number

Name

Description

Map Ref. No. Class

Standards
1
AO portion as described

Atlantic Ocean

Extending from shore a distance of three miles and
between a line extending due south from Potunk Point south of Westhampton Beach
and a line extending due south of Mecox Coast Guard Station which is south of

Bridgehampton. 3 2
SA
SA
2
P 790 portion as described

Mecox Bay except Hayground Cove

Large bay located to southeast of Water Mill. 2

SA

up cover to line extending across cove from first point on westerly shore. 2

SA

P 790 portion as described

Hayground Cove

From point 1,500 feet to point 3,250 feet up cove
or between lines extending across cove between first and second points above
mouth on westerly shore. 2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
